758850.name: Nachzehrer
758850.description:
[h1]Nachzehrer[/h1]
Your fear of being in the dark comes true in this short single player horror game. You find yourself stuck at a power plant at night, when suddenly the lights begin shutting off. However, attempting to turn them back on may cause you to meet your fears.

Enjoy this short horror game that attempts to use a unique horror tactic that has never been used in other games. See if you can figure out how to prevent your fears from seeing you!
